ComicInfo.Summary: A Certain Sacrifice: A cadre of heroes have a final showdown with Quantum. Cabbot is finally able to defeat his father but he and his entire Bloodstrike team (sans Chapel) are killed in the process.
ComicInfo.Teams: The Covenant of The Sword,New Men,Brotherhood of Man,Bloodstrike,Brigade,Youngblood
ComicInfo.Title: A Certain Sacrifice
